Uses of Interface
de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.api.IBoard

Packages that use IBoard
de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.api Common interfaces for a TicTacToe board, player and move. 
de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.game Game logic, rules and a tournament class. 
de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.player Player classes, e.g a Random Player or Keyboard Player.

 void IPlayer.onMatchEnds(IBoard board)
          Is called when a match ended, meaning the player won, lost or the match was a draw.

Constructors in de.ovgu.dke.teaching.ml.tictactoe.game with parameters of type IBoard
BoundBoard(IBoard board, IPlayer player, IPlayer opponent)
          Initializes a new proxy board that is bound to the player, obfuscating his opponent.
Match(IBoard board, IPlayer player1, IPlayer player2)
          Creates a new match between two players.
Tournament(IBoard board, Set<IPlayer> players, int rounds)
          Creates a tournament on a board, using a set of players and a number of rounds.
